subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: James Kingston shot a one-under 71 to beat Oliver Wilson by one stroke at the South African Open on Sunday.Kingston, of South Africa, finished at four-under 284 as darkness set in after an earlier rain delay at the Pearl Valley Golf Estates course in Paarl. Greg Norman shot a 71 and finished tied for seventh. Ernie Els had a 69 to finish in a tie for 16th with Retief Goosen, who shot a 75.
